message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a steal at $18,000. I know it's valuable to you, and I'm looking for a quick sale.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product is high, but I'm only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is really my bottom line to make this deal worthwhile.  I'm confident it's a fair price considering its value. What do you say?
